metadata.synopsis: A goblin taking part in an attack on a group of civilians, hiding in a refuge

0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Sneem
0.text: All this killin'... for the Absolute!
0.context: NodeContext: standing over corpses after a slaughter - praising his god, the Absolute

1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Sneem
1.context: NodeContext: a warcry as he prepares for battle
